text:
Ampyx Power | Embedded SW Engineer | The Hague, The Netherlands | ONSITE

We are an international and multi-disciplinary team developing an Airborne Wind Energy System (AWES) that can access powerful wind at high altitude using tethered unmanned aircraft. Check our website for technical details: https://www.ampyxpower.com/

Keywords: C, POSIX, RTOS, ARM Cortex-M, Qt5.

Job description & application: https://ampyxpowerjobs.recruitee.com/o/software-engineer
